mod_info.title: McDonald's
mod_info.subtitle: Nazi zombies at McDonald’s…
mod_info.description:
If you’re looking for a fun, fast paced map, this is the one for you. Verrucket runners with non-stop action. A great map to play co-op. Please give feedback on how the map is.

Features:

  • Kino-Style Teleporters
  • Custom Weapons (all upgrade-able)
  • Custom Weapon camos
  • Tranzit Zombies
  • Custom textures
  • Buyable powerup
  • Buyable ending
  • Modified zombie properties
  • weather


Weapon List:
AK-47, AK-74u, Black Ops 2 M1911, CZ75, fal, famas, galil, hk21, flamethrower, m60, mp5k, mp7, peacekeeper, ray gun, rpk, spas, stakeout, stoner63, tac45, wunderwaffle, + few customized WaW weapons

Credits:
Green-182/Blink-420(me)
Tom_bmx
Rorke
UGXteam

Enjoy the map
mod_info.game: Call of Duty: World at War
